original_title: SL Post adds Sita Temple to its collection
original_body_lines: Prime Minister Dinesh Gunawardena accompanied by India’s High Commissioner Gopal Baglay and other dignitaries yesterday issued a Special Commemorative Cover for Sita Temple near Nuwara Eliya. They also laid the foundation stone for a Meditation Centre at the Temple, which is believed to signify the place of Ashok Vatika in the epic Ramayana. The Meditation Centre will add to the facilities at the Temple and help attract more tourists from India and elsewhere. Here Gunawardena and Baglay showcase the first day cover.
